description.zh-cn: 中国共产党党员，中国人民解放军军事人物，拥有少将军衔，曾任中国人民解放军驻香港部队副政委。
description.en: A member of the Communist Party of China, a military figure in the People's Liberation Army with the rank of Major General, who served as the Deputy Political Commissar of the PLA Hong Kong Garrison.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军驻香港部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军驻香港部队
en: People's Liberation Army Hong Kong Garrison

description.zh-cn: 2010年8月在菲律宾马尼拉发生的一起劫持事件，导致多名香港游客伤亡。
description.en: A hostage crisis that occurred in Manila, Philippines in August 2010, resulting in casualties among several Hong Kong tourists.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who served as the Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室

zh-cn: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室
中央人民政府驻港联络办
en: Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Director of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部驻香港特别行政区特派员公署

en: Office of the Commissioner of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部驻香港特别行政区特派员。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat who served as the Commissioner of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军驻香港部队

description.zh-cn: 因马尼拉人质事件一同前往礼顿山社区礼堂追悼遇难者。
description.en: Attended a memorial service for the victims of the Manila hostage crisis at Leighton Hill Community Hall together.
